quote: If Congress refuse to listen to and grant what women ask, there is but one course left then to pursue. What is there left for women to do but to become the mothers of the future government?
quote_letters: IF CONGRESS REFUSE TO LISTEN TO AND GRANT WHAT WOMEN ASK THERE IS BUT ONE COURSE LEFT THEN TO PURSUE WHAT IS THERE LEFT FOR WOMEN TO DO BUT TO BECOME THE MOTHERS OF THE FUTURE GOVERNMENT
